trade_recharge_accumulative_recharge: The accumulated recharge in the last month is {amount}$
trade_recharge_over_award_tip: Over 20,000$, every 1,000$ top-up will get a free king photo frame + lion king photo frame for 7 days.
trade_recharge_salary_advance_amount_inp: Please enter the amount you want to advance below:
trade_recharge_salary_advance_success_ti: We will process your application within 24 hours., please wait patiently.
trade_recharge_recharge_compensation_tip:
We will compensate the corresponding difference according to the accumulated amount of your current recharge, for example:
You recharged 600$ through Fawry, and your current accumulative recharge is in the range of 1000-3000, we will compensate the 600$ with 8000 gold coins for every 100$
